description:
Hello and welcome to The Introduction to Linux CentOS Course , This course Designed for newbie and beginners who would like to learn about Linux

In this course we will learn together

- What is Linux?

- Linux History

- What does Linux Distributions means?

- Linux File System Hierarchy

- Install VirtualBox

- Install Linux

- Linux essential commands

- Creating, renaming, moving, and deleting files and directories

- You will learn the most used Linux basic commands

- You will learn how to archive and compress files

- You will learn how to combine two or more commands using pipes

- You will learn how to redirect an output to a file

after finishing this course, you will be passionate to learn more about Linux
title: Introduction To Linux CentOS 7
